Posts.Content:
Hi, am also experiencing itch on the left side of my breast. Sometimes it could be intense. No other symptoms too. I went further research about
 itchiness in breasts and found out that it may be the cause of dry skin. They recommend a lot of creams on the net and am not familiar with all of them. Since my skin is very sensitive, I tried putting on petroleum jelly surrounding my left breast and it worked. It minimized the itchiness. I'll try to do it again tomorrow and will tell you about
 further results. 
 I don't have burning sensation though. Just plain itch.
Posts.Title: itchy breast with burning sensation
